name: Cozy Neko!- DEMO
description:
A short, cute, point-and-click game where you follow the short conversations of two neko cat girlfriends and the new home.

-FEATURES-

-All the expressions are animated/blink when talking

-The game is very wholesome and cute

-The art is nice and simple

-Only about 5-7 minutes long of a game

-Only cheesy, kind, positive dialogue 'cause I am make of cotton candy 'v')b

-Only TWO cat puns! and no weeb shit!

-Its kinda messed up and possibly a bit buggy! Am looking for spelling errors!!

-More rooms, dialogue, things to click will be added in full version! 

-Twitter @MoroseMuffin

Good vibes only!~ I dont wanna develop games or care about how to 'improve' the game! this was just for fun! <3
